question: is it haram for me to earn money from ads on my site by clicking myself? What are good food and diet for a healthier marital life? meaning of the name Maarab.
answer:
QUESTION
1) i have a site. there are ads from google.com on it of other sites (google/adsense). if anyone comes to my site and clicks on the ads, i get money. is it haram for me to click on the ads myself to increase the money? 2) What are good food, diets and exercises for a healthier marital life in terms of sex told by Prophet Muhammad (p.b.u.h)/Islam. Is there any resource on the net where this information can be got? 3) please give me any contact of an alim and psychiatrist. 4) please tell me the meaning fo the name Maarab.
ANSWER


Share:
1. This would be impermissible as it constitutes deception.

2. The information you seek is available on our site ? alinaam.org.za

3. Please refer to the Darul Uloom nearest to you in Pakistan.

4. Maarab is an Arabic word meaning ?a need?.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
